fire_fighter_tree.title: Versatility Training
fire_fighter_tree.description: Can be used in place of Search and Rescue, cooldown increased by 50% if doing so

fire_fighter_tree.title: Local Volunteers
fire_fighter_tree.description: Cooldown decreased to 4 days in City and Village tiles

fire_fighter_tree.title: Motorized Response
fire_fighter_tree.description: Area of Effect increased by one hex

fire_fighter_tree.title: Military Training
fire_fighter_tree.description: Cooldown decreased to 3 days in City and Village tiles, 4 days otherwise

fire_fighter_tree.title: The Force Grows
fire_fighter_tree.description: One additional Firefighter team, total of 2

fire_fighter_tree.title: Helicopter Fleet
fire_fighter_tree.description: Area of Effect increased by one hex, for a total of two
